text: The 2004–05 Algerian Championnat National was the 43rd season of the Algerian Championnat National since its establishment in 1962. A total of 16 teams contested the league, with JS Kabylie as the defending champions, The Championnat started on August 20, 2004. and ended on June 13, 2005. ==Team summaries== === Promotion and relegation === Teams promoted from Algerian Division 2 2004–2005 * Paradou AC * CA Batna * US Biskra Teams relegated to Algerian Division 2 2005–2006 * OMR El Annasser * GC Mascara * US Chaouia
